long_description: This easy-to-use, florinated aerosol wax works for all snow conditions from very wet to very cold; just apply and go! Remove the cap and apply to your skis or snowboard for smoother gliding, easier turning and more control. Also prevents the base from drying out through oxidation and may help prevent scratches in poor snow conditions.
short_description: This easy-to-use, florinated aerosol wax works for all snow conditions from very wet to very cold; just apply and go!
